response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, the product is valued at $1,500,000. Considering its immense worth and the potential impact it could have on your endeavors, I kindly invite you to consider acquiring this item at the same price. I am confident that this investment will prove highly beneficial for you in the long run. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1500000}
